title: User Reward Balance Changed Webhook Schema
description: Sent whenever something happens to change this user's available reward balance (e.g. rewards given/expired/etc)

balanceUnit.title: Reward Balance Unit
balanceUnit.description: The unit corresponding to this reward balance

availableValue.title: Available Reward Balance
availableValue.description: The reward balance available to be redeemed

resourceVersion.title: Resource Version
resourceVersion.description: Webhook delivery order is not guaranteed, use this to ensure you don't overwrite a later version of a balance with a more recent one
